name: Adding items to several peoples lists

testSteps.description: Given that James has a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog

children.description: James starts with a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog
James opens the Application home page
James adds the todo items called: [Buy some milk, Walk the dog]
James adds a todo item called: Buy some milk
James enters 'Buy some milk' into 'What needs to be done?' field
James adds a todo item called: Walk the dog
James enters 'Walk the dog' into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: And that Jill has a todo list containing Buy some milk, Buy some cheese

children.description: Jill starts with a todo list containing Buy some milk, Buy some cheese
Jill opens the Application home page
Jill adds the todo items called: [Buy some milk, Buy some cheese]
Jill adds a todo item called: Buy some milk
Jill enters 'Buy some milk' into 'What needs to be done?' field
Jill adds a todo item called: Buy some cheese
Jill enters 'Buy some cheese' into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: When she adds 'Buy some cereal' to her list

children.description: Jill adds a todo item called: Buy some cereal
Jill enters 'Buy some cereal' into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: Then Jill's todo list should contain Buy some milk, Buy some cheese, Buy some cereal

children.description: Then the displayed todo items should be ([Buy some milk, Buy some cheese, Buy some cereal])

testSteps.description: And James's todo list should contain Buy some milk, Walk the dog

children.description: Then the displayed todo items should be ([Buy some milk, Walk the dog])

userStory.storyName: Adding new items to the todo list
userStory.narrative:
In order to avoid having to remember things that need doing
As a forgetful person
I want to be able to record what I need to do in a place where I won't forget about them

featureTag.name: Adding new items to the todo list

title: Adding items to several peoples lists
